import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FoodService } from '../services/food/food.service'; import { Food } from '../shared/models/Food'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { foods: Food[] = []; constructor(private foodService: FoodService) { } ngOnInit(): void{ this.foods = this.foodService.getAll() } }
